code:
class RateLimiter:
    def __init__(self, limit, timeout):
        self.limit = limit
        self.timeout = timeout
        self.requests = []
        self.current_time = 0

    def is_allowed(self, timestamp):
        self.requests = [req for req in self.requests if req[0] >= timestamp - self.timeout]
        now = timestamp // self.timeout
        if len(self.requests) < self.limit and now > self.current_time:
            self.current_time = now
            self.requests.append((timestamp, 1))
            return True
        return False

limiter = RateLimiter(5, 300)  # 5 requests per 5 minutes

# tests
print(limiter.is_allowed(1614547950))
print(limiter.is_allowed(1614547951))
print(limiter.is_allowed(1614547952))
print(limiter.is_allowed(1614547950))  # 300 seconds have passed
